sentences.en: " Cold bad, Gorilla hate, " Koko tells me, as I stand, dripping, outside her caravan.
sentences.cn: 当我一身湿淋淋地站在她的屋外时,科科告诉我说: “ 冷不好, 大猩猩讨厌. ”

sentences.en: " Why don't you keep my three, sir , and make up a caravan? "
sentences.cn: “ 老者,留下我的三匹, 凑一把儿 吧 ? ”

sentences.en: At length the lady of the caravan shook off her fit of meditation.
sentences.cn: 最后车上那个女子抛弃了她那一阵的沉思.

sentences.en: Geoff connected the caravan to the car.
sentences.cn: 杰弗把旅行用的住屋拖车挂在汽车上.

sentences.en: He packed off his wife and children to stay in a caravan in Wales.
sentences.cn: 他把妻儿打发到在威尔士的一辆旅行拖车上去住。

sentences.en: Just then caravan passed by with their camels .
sentences.cn: 就在这时，一支骆驼商队经过此处。

sentences.en: Once we were part of a caravan of twelve thousand camels.
sentences.cn: 我们曾和一支有一万二千头骆驼的商队一起行进.

sentences.en: Our story begins with a caravan heading through the wasteland of Durotar.
sentences.cn: 我们的故事从穿越杜隆塔尔荒地的车队开始.

sentences.en: Pendergood had shovelled the sand out of the caravan.
sentences.cn: 彭德古德把旅行拖车里的沙子铲了出来。

sentences.en: The caravan followed at no great distance.
The Caravan was Motor Trend magazine's Car of the Year for 1996.
sentences.cn: 在大篷车是汽车趋势杂志的1996年年度车型.

sentences.en: The caravan was raked with bullets.
The train out - moded the caravan.
The two soldiers rode up to the head of the caravan.
sentences.cn: 两个士兵骑马赶到旅行队的前头.

sentences.en: Your supply caravan has arrived. Thank you my lord.
sentences.cn: 你的补给车队已经到达,非常感谢你.

trans.tran_cn: 旅行拖车，房车，大篷车，旅行队
trans.tran_en: a vehicle that a car can pull and in which people can live and sleep when they are on holiday

trans.tran_cn: 乘拖车度假；参加旅行队旅行
